idea-plugin.name: Git Commit Template Personal
idea-plugin.description:
Create a commit message with the following template:

        <type>[<scope>]: <subject>
        <BLANK LINE>
        <body>
        <BLANK LINE>
        <footer>

For example:

        fix[$compile]: couple of unit tests for IE 9

        [Older IEs serialize html uppercased, but IE9 does not...
        Would be better to expect case insensitive, unfortunately jasmine does
        not allow to user regexps for throw exectations]

        [fixed: #392]

The plug-in is based on Git Commit Template
